General.Name: Kiwibox.Com Inc
General.Description: Kiwibox.Com, Inc. owns and operates Kiwibox.com, a social networking Website. The company was formerly known as Magnitude Information Systems, Inc. and changed its name to Kiwibox.Com, Inc. in December 2009. Kiwibox.Com, Inc. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: 330 West 42nd Street, New York, NY, United States, 10036
